thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Morning Downpour Douses Subway Stations

author: Paul Berger
title: Morning Downpour Douses Subway Stations
text:
Heavy rainfall Monday morning turned some New York City subway stations into waterfalls.
With flash flood warnings blaring from cellphones, social media filled up with photos and videos of rain pouring down station staircases and onto platforms.
Even so, disruption from the weather was limited and short-lived. The worst flooding was in Manhattan...
